name: Bagman (itch)
description:
Bagman retro arcade remake of 1982 classic platformer

Click on the game to get focus

Arrow keys to move.

ENTER is action key

  1. Pick up bags
  2. Drop bags in the wheelbarrow
  3. Push Wheelbarrow
  4. Pick up Axe
  5. Hang on/off hang bars to ride the minecart

Pick up all money bags and deposit in wheelbarrow to complete the level.
